page.title: 14Village Organisations
page.content: The village of Great Doddington has many organisations catering for old and young alike. The children can go to cubs, scouts, girls brigade and there is a Sunday School at the chapel and the church. There are two Women's Institutes one meeting in the afternoon and one in the evening. A Whist Club meets once a month and there is a Friendship Club for the elderly which meets every Friday. There are classes for keep fit, local history and cake decorating. The Friends of Great Doddington Primary School hold social evenings for parents and friends. They also have discos, beetle drives and film shows for the children at the school. The Stag's Head public house has a darts team and other games are also played there.
